dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3260 IH: Mental Health Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Sykes (for herself and Mr. Joyce of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize mental and behavioral health education and training grants.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Mental Health Improvement Act.

section.header: Mental and behavioral health education and training grants
section.text: Section 756(f) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 294eâ€“1(f)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2023 through 2027 and inserting fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
